name: Provolone Meatball Sliders
author: BelGioioso Cheese
summary: Mini meatloaves are grilled up and served with slices of provolone cheese on split baguette slices with grilled onions and sun-dried tomatoes.
ingredients: 16 ounces ground meatloaf mix (beef, veal, pork)
½ cup grated BelGioioso Romano cheese
½ cup sun-dried tomatoes, very thinly sliced
directions: Combine ground meats with egg, BelGioioso Romano, parsley, garlic, salt and pepper in mixing bowl
Slowly add water, mixing until moist
Refrigerate patties until ready to cook
Grill or pan-grill meatball burgers over medium heat on lightly oiled grill
Add 1 slice of cheese, halved to fit, atop each burger
Cook 1 minute longer to melt cheese
Toast bread, cut side down on grill
Serve each cheeseburger with 2 tablespoons grilled onions and 2 tablespoons sun-dried tomatoes
